00039 typedef CstrHashMap<int> CountMap; // filename -> reference count
00040 
00041 struct GcWorker {
00042   GcWorker(TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs, int interval_millis,
00043            bool dryrun = false) : m_metadata(metadata),
00044            m_fs(fs), m_interval_millis(interval_millis), m_dryrun(dryrun) {}
00045 
00046   TablePtr     &m_metadata;
00047   Filesystem   *m_fs;
00048   int           m_interval_millis;
00049   bool          m_dryrun;
00050 
00051   void
00052   scan_metadata(CountMap &files_map) {
00053     TableScannerPtr scanner;
00054     ScanSpec scan_spec;
00055 
00056     scan_spec.columns.clear();
00057     scan_spec.columns.push_back("Files");
00058 
00059     scanner = m_metadata->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00060 
00061     TableMutatorPtr mutator = m_metadata->create_mutator();
00062 
00063     Cell cell;
00064     string last_row;
00065     string last_cq;
00066     uint64_t last_time = 0;
00067     bool found_valid_files = true;
00068 
00069     HT_DEBUG("MasterGc: scanning metadata...");
00070 
00071     while (scanner->next(cell)) {
00072       if (strcmp("Files", cell.column_family)) {
00073         HT_ERRORF("Unexpected column family '%s', while scanning METADATA",
00074                   cell.column_family);
00075         continue;
00076       }
00077       if (last_row != cell.row_key) {
00078         // new row
00079         if (!found_valid_files)
00080           delete_row(last_row, mutator);
00081 
00082         last_row = cell.row_key;
00083         last_cq = cell.column_qualifier;
00084         last_time = cell.timestamp;
00085         found_valid_files = *cell.value != '!';
00086 
00087         if (found_valid_files)
00088           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len, 1);
00089       }
00090       else if (last_cq != cell.column_qualifier) {
00091         // new access group
00092         last_cq = cell.column_qualifier;
00093         last_time = cell.timestamp;
00094         int is_valid_files = *cell.value != '!';
00095         found_valid_files |= is_valid_files;
00096 
00097         if (is_valid_files)
00098           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len, 1);
00099       }
00100       else {
00101         // cruft to delete
00102         if (cell.timestamp > last_time) {
00103           HT_ERROR("Unexpected timestamp order while scanning METADATA");
00104           continue;
00105         }
00106         if (*cell.value != '!') {
00107           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00108           delete_cell(cell, mutator);
00109         }
00110       }
00111     }
00112     // for last table
00113     if (!found_valid_files)
00114       delete_row(last_row, mutator);
00115 
00116     mutator->flush();
00117   }
00118 
00119   void
00120   delete_row(const string &row, TableMutatorPtr &mutator) {
00121     KeySpec key;
00122 
00123     if (row.empty())
00124       return;
00125 
00126     key.row = row.c_str();
00127     key.row_len = row.length();
00128 
00129     HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: Deleting row %s", (char *)key.row);
00130 
00131     if (!m_dryrun)
00132       mutator->set_delete(key);
00133   }
00134 
00135   void
00136   delete_cell(const Cell &cell, TableMutatorPtr &mutator) {
00137     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"MasterGc: Deleting cell: ("<< cell.row_key <<", "
00138                  << cell.column_family <<", "<< cell.column_qualifier <<", "
00139                  << cell.timestamp <<')'<< HT_END;
00140 
00141     KeySpec key(cell.row_key, cell.column_family, cell.column_qualifier,
00142                 cell.timestamp);
00143 
00144     if (!m_dryrun)
00145       mutator->set_delete(key);
00146   }
00147 
00148   void
00149   insert_files(CountMap &map, const char *buf, size_t len, int c = 0) {
00150     const char *p = buf, *pn = p, *endp = p + len - 1;
00151 
00152     while (p < endp) {
00153       while (p < endp && (*p != ';' ||  p[1] != '\n'))
00154         ++p;
00155 
00156       if (p == endp)
00157         break;
00158 
00159       string name(pn, p - pn);
00160       p += 2;
00161       insert_file(map, name.c_str(), c);
00162       pn = p;
00163     }
00164   }
00165 
00166   void
00167   insert_file(CountMap &map, const char *fname, int c) {
00168     if (*fname == '#')
00169       ++fname;
00170 
00171     CountMap::InsRet ret = map.insert(fname, c);
00172 
00173     if (!ret.second)
00174       (*ret.first).second += c;
00175   }
00176 
00182   void
00183   reap(CountMap &files_map) {
00184     size_t nf = 0, nf_done = 0, nd = 0, nd_done = 0;
00185     CountMap dirs_map; // reap empty range directories as well
00186 
00187     foreach (const CountMap::value_type &v, files_map) {
00188       if (!v.second) {
00189         HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removing file %s", v.first);
00190 
00191         if (!m_dryrun) {
00192           try {
00193             m_fs->remove(v.first);
00194             ++nf_done;
00195           }
00196           catch (Exception &e) {
00197             HT_WARNF("%s", e.what());
00198           }
00199         }
00200         ++nf;
00201       }
00202       char *p = (char*)strrchr(v.first, '/');
00203 
00204       if (p) {
00205         string dir_name(v.first, p - v.first);
00206         insert_file(dirs_map, dir_name.c_str(), v.second);
00207       }
00208     }
00209     foreach (const CountMap::value_type &v, dirs_map) {
00210       if (!v.second) {
00211         HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removing directory %s", v.first);
00212 
00213         if (!m_dryrun) {
00214           try {
00215             m_fs->rmdir(v.first);
00216             ++nd_done;
00217           }
00218           catch (Exception &e) {
00219             HT_ERRORF("%s", e.what());
00220           }
00221         }
00222         ++nd;
00223       }
00224     }
00225 
00226     HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removed %lu/%lu files; %lu/%lu directories",
00227               (Lu)nf_done, (Lu)nf, (Lu)nd_done, (Lu)nd);
00228   }
00229 
00230   void
00231   gc() {
00232     try {
00233       CountMap files_map;
00234       scan_metadata(files_map);
00235       // TODO: scan_directories(files_map); // fsckish, slower
00236       reap(files_map);
00237     }
00238     catch (Exception &e) {
00239       HT_ERRORF("Error: caught exception while gc'ing: %s", e.what());
00240     }
00241   }
00242 
00243   void
00244   operator()() {
00245     do {
00246       int remain = poll(0, 0, m_interval_millis);
00247 
00248       if (remain)
00249         break; // interrupted
00250 
00251       if (m_metadata) gc();
00252       else HT_INFOF("MasterGc: METADATA not ready, will try again in "
00253                     "%d milliseconds", m_interval_millis);
00254 
00255     } while (true);
00256   }
00257 };
00258 
00259 } // local namespace

00261 namespace Hypertable {
00262 
00263 void
00264 master_gc_start(PropertiesPtr &cfg, ThreadGroup &threads,
00265                 TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs) {
00266   int interval_millis = cfg->get_i32("Hypertable.Master.Gc.Interval");
00267 
00268   HT_ASSERT(interval_millis >= 1000);
00269 
00270   threads.create_thread(GcWorker(metadata, fs, interval_millis));
00271 
00272   HT_INFOF("Started table file garbage collection thread with interval: "
00273            "%d milliseconds", interval_millis);
00274 }
00275 
00276 void
00277 master_gc_once(TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs, bool dryrun) {
00278   GcWorker worker(metadata, fs, 0, dryrun);
00279   worker.gc();
00280 }
